## sparkline variable

Customizable, stateless SVG sparkline component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sparkline: (_: any, _opts: Partial<SparklineOpts>, vals: number[]) => (string | {
    width: number;
    height: number;
    stroke: string;
    fill: string;
} | (string | {
    points: string;
})[] | (string | {
    cx: number;
    cy: number;
    r: number;
    fill: string;
})[])[]
```
